attributes.action:
Keep Buttercups PreSchool Open!!
& stop the rent being put up!
attributes.background:
Buttercups PreSchool is a nursery within a school grounds in Stafford. 
It is a brilliant early years setting for children aged 2+. The rent has been put up & because the nursery can't afford it they are forced to close on the 26th May. The school has been approached but are refusing to help!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
